name: TrenchRaiders
description:
Trench raiders is an deep-ocean explorer horror game, which takes the player on a journey of discovering the history of the wrecked ship SS-MercuryV and how it came to end. During this expedition, the player has to avoid the detection of the veracious creatures that roam the deep. Can you find out what happened to the crew of SS-MercuryV? 

Controls:

movement

keys WS to move back and forward
keys AD to move left and right
keys QE to rotate left and right 
Spacebar to move up
Shift to move down

G to deploy drone
H to retrieve drone
P to scan wreck
